subject: Re: [junit] Recover from test hangs
msgSnippet: ... not ... I would think that is the only way to stop a hung thread. The thread can t stop itself if it s hung... paradox... I vaguely remember a lesson in
messageBody:
> Since I use the Thread.stop()-deprecated to kill the spawning thread, I am
not
> content of this solution, at the very least.

I would think that is the only way to stop a "hung" thread. The thread can't
stop itself if it's hung... paradox...

I vaguely remember a lesson in one of my computing lessons that a computing
system would not able to tell the difference if a thread is running or hung,
becuz from the outside, the "black box" it looks the same.
